Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses are available between Belmont and Racine to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
